Title: Statistical Programmer

Title: PKPD scientist
Description: they are in the midst of a major growth phase. They are looking for a dedicated modeling and simulations scientist to conduct clinical and nonclinical pharmacokinetics (PK) and pharmacodynamics (PD) data analysis. This person will also be responsible for establishing population and mechanism based PK/PD models, exposure-response analysis, NCA, visual evaluation of large data sets, PK/PD data management, and oversight of ousourced quantitative analyses.
